> wingedwarrior41@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > OOC: 16 feet is the current size limit, and the gestelts we had 
were

builds
> > her old form on top of her current one, making her smaller but 
legal

> 
> I'm just curious as to how that size chart came about though.

Well, imagine the automatic slaughter that would ensue when someone 
brings a character the relative size of Omega Supreme, or worse, 
Trypticon into a battle, and you'll see why it makes sense.
